Events that occurred on 9 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1930 - Author Lin Carter is born.
1941 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 45.
1957 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to William Ready.
1963 - Actress Megan Edwards is born.
1963 - J.R.R. Tolkien's paper "English and Welsh" is published in Angles and Britons: O'Donnell Lectures, a collection of lectures from the University of Wales.
1966 - John Garth is born.
2010 - Midway Games is closed, because of bankruptcy.
2012 - The Broken Scythe: Death and Immortality in the Works of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
2016 - The Return Of The Ring: Proceedings of the Tolkien Society Conference 2012 is published.
2020 - The Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
